        Parameters:

        event - the id of the event.
        Returns:

      • removeTaskFor

        public void removeTaskFor(java.util.UUID person,
                          Event event)
        Remove the task for the event of the person. (using Task.isTaskFor(event)) If no such task, do nothing.
        Specified by:
        removeTaskFor in interface TaskManage
        Parameters:
        person - the person.
        event - the id of the event.
